name: Trollsome
description:
Dr.White is taking over the city! It's up to you to stop him!

note:some of the credits are false. the  design was made by trollsome, and the code was made by trollsome, red guy, and sundeco. we also don't own the music and sound effects. the music was made by Nintendo, Atgames, SEGA, and Capcom. we don't know who made the sound effects.

Jun/29/18:Game Released, Added tutorial, and only Spikey is a playable stage.

Jun/30/18: Added Death Animation

July/1/18: Added Vetrix Stage

July/2/18: Added Mecha Trollsome and Roller + Bug Fixes

July/3/18: Game Finished

July/4/18: Self Destruct Time Limit added and SPOILER ALERT: Alternate Ending added

Nov/3/18: Fixed instant kill on Dr.White

Nov/9/18: itch.io Windows release
